about_the_game:
Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten! is an erotic 2D RPG set in the fictional land of Amerika.

In this second installment of the Drumpf! series, you re-assume the mantle of Drumpf; once God-Emperor of the super-continent of Amerika, now downtrodden freedom fighter, facing former friends. After liberating the oppressed denizens of Suborno and Déchu from hordes of "asylum seekers" and "economic migrants", Drumpf and his Fighters For Freedom must race back to Drumpf's homeland - the birthplace of Fire, Fury, and Freedom - Libertonia.

Features
  • Your party consists of 4 characters, each with their own unique skills and class.
  • Turn-based JRPG combat system.
  • Face off against the media mogul Lord Billary, Duke of Arkans, and his puppet-president, Hilaria.
  • Join forces with Goldwater, street-smart slum-dog with no memories and a heart of gold.
  • Aid Kim Kil Yu in hunting the fiendish fables of North Libertonia!
  • A plethora of dungeons and puzzles to explore!
  • Over 50 enemies!
  • 62 Unique bromides to collect!
  • Over 59 piece of armor and weapons.
  • Over 40 minutes of original music.

content_descriptors.notes: There are gratuitous depictions of both sexual acts and violence in this game. If you are not okay with either of those things, this may not be the game for you.

name: Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

short_description: At the height of his power, God-Emperor Drumpf was violently dethroned by The Usurpers: dictators who helped overthrow the rightful rulers of the world. Now he's on a mission of vengeance!
